data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xue, Xiao-Feng, Luo, Jia, Xu, Yun, Hong, Xiao-Yue (2011): A new eriophyoid mite species infesting Schefflera odorata (Araliaceae) in Yunnan Province, southwestern China (Acari: Eriophyoidea). Zootaxa 3037: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.200854
